Review.Titre: Never received web site that was to be…
Review.Contenu: Never received web site that was to be created.

Review.Titre: I put it there because I need more time…
Review.Contenu: I put it there because I need more time to learn the app but so far I'm ok with it

Review.Titre: The visual appearance of the site is…
Review.Contenu: The visual appearance of the site is great and most functionality is also good, but we have two major issues that may result in us going back to our old website host.  The two issues are the email limits and, most importantly, the scheduling function.  It is very poor and lacks the ability to enter recurring events. If the scheduling function on jersey watch is not significantly improved, we will be terminating it.

Review.Titre: I need to be able to make list out of…
Review.Contenu: I need to be able to make list out of the age division for players and then print that.  It would only let you print certain things which I had to copy past into word to create what I needed. Also, I would get emails (notifications) of a comment being left but I could not find some and I could not directly reply to any.

The website is nice.  At one time you could make custom contact lists out of the overall group list, for different events or notifications.  They upgraded the site and took this option away.  Said they we’re bringing it back and never did.   It’s unfortunate because it was a very useful option and now it’s gone.

Review.Titre: Great Website but missing some key…
Review.Contenu: Great Website but missing some key features. Need a way to create Repeating schedule that can be tied to the notification and registration needs updated to include a monthly registrations with payment plan selection that can change by the month.

Review.Titre: I was really surprised at the quick…customer support
Review.Contenu: I was really surprised at the quick feedback from support, I still feel they need phone support but they were quick to get back with me for all my questions.They were so helpful in setting up the website which the other companies I had before were not as user friendly made the whole process less stressful

Great customer service and website meets all necessary requirements. My only request would be a cheaper version that doesn’t have all the same features as the basic. Such as removing text messages, notifications, etc. I find I don’t need any of these features

Jersey watch has excellent response time and a very nice staff. The only reason they received 4 stars and not 5 Stars is due to the fact that I personally like to handle items verbally on the phone instead of email. They do offer you to schedule phone calls with one of their Representatives but it is normally a day or two away and I am working on the particular item I wish to discuss at that moment. That being said if you like using email, I haven't seen a better company to work with!!

Review.Titre: Very happy with the product so far
Review.Contenu: Very happy with the product so far. Very easy to use, website is set up very nice & I’ve had very positive experiences with the staff so far. Could be a little more detail put in differentiating between Canadian & American sites. Overall we are very happy with the service for the value. This is an insurmountable better quality & useability than our previous provider, leaguelineup.com & far better priced than Teamsnap, who we were going to use before discovering this site.

Review.Titre: Goshen Jr Sports is working to create…
Review.Contenu: Goshen Jr Sports is working to create our website with Jersey Watch. As this is our first time creating something of this magnitude, I must say it has been very easy so far, Sierra has been in contact with me and has been very helpful! The customer service has been fantastic. We are looking forward to learning and growing with them in the future !

I have been contacting the support people at Jersey Watch for the past several months. Everyone I interact with has been friendly and helpful... and were graciously kind in some areas when I should have watched a video beforehand before asking for help. The website is very useful, although there are a couple of areas that could be easier to interact with: Creating contact lists from spreadsheets could be more automated to speed up the process - maybe having a pre-formated spreadsheet to download contact information with copy/paste (and the downloading from a spreadsheet could be explained in a little more detail in the video). It would be easier to obtain assistance if there were a chat box or phone number to talk directly with someone instead of having to use email as a communication tool.

Review.Titre: They were very responsive to my…
Review.Contenu: They were very responsive to my questions. Usually responded to my messages within minutes.
The people at Jersey Watch are always extremely helpful.

Review.Titre: This has been a great program so far to…
Review.Contenu: This has been a great program so far to use. Very easy to navigate and build the site!

Review.Titre: everything has been good only rated 4…
Review.Contenu: everything has been good only rated 4 out of 5 is because of not having total complete edit & customization freedom. Have to reach out to customer service for help on certain things that you should have the capability of doing without having to reach out & ask for help doing or ask for something to be done

Review.Titre: A phone call would have been preferable…
Review.Contenu: A phone call would have been preferable to a thread of emails.

Review.Titre: Site works well and is easy to use for…
Review.Contenu: Site works well and is easy to use for what it does.  Missing a few features and customization options that it could really use to make it even better and give it 5 stars, but it will definitely work for now.  Support has been great, quickly answering any questions or issues i've had so far.

It was great knowing i could send an email or message and get a very quick and helpful response.  Other sites don’t have that good of customer support.  We were also on a time crunch with a lot to do so the Jersey Watch team took over and made the site for us with minimal input.

Review.Titre: Recommend Jersey Watch for Youth Organizations.
Review.Contenu: Service was great, the team was excellent at assisting us with most things. The only negative would be some of the functionality of a more robust site was not found...such as the ability to upload documents with registrations and an easier repository to add our own documents. Looking forward to an expansion where they will allow document uploads during the registration process but overall very satisfied with the level of service received and think this company has great potential to occupy a very needed market.

Review.Titre: Jersey Watch has helped us organize our…
Review.Contenu: Jersey Watch has helped us organize our wrestling program immensely.  Having all the tools needed in one locations ie. announcements, payments, schedule and being able to create the web page specifically to your program is well worth the money.  The only issue I have with it is the CC fee's, but I know this is with all businesses.  I do wish the exported spread sheet could be altered to your specific needs.  All and all, I love this program and plan to be with them for the future of the Southern Boone Wrestling Club.

The crew you have is amazing! I can’t tell you how nice It is to be able to drop an email to ask for help updating some things switching players adding something and it’s done within the day!  While  you’re a Rec  Board President, mom and Nurse and have 1 million other things going on in your day.

Overall, a very kind team of people who helped me get my website up and going! They were able to transfer all the information from my old website to this new one for me in a timely manner and totally exceeded my expectations on what the new website would look like!

everyone was great, great customer service, the organization felt it was time for a change with more options for the web. can not complain about any of the services provided. hope to do business in the future.
Overall my experience is good. I haven’t been able to run any programs due to COVID so I don’t know if it’s easy for people to register or not but everything on the backend does what I want it to.
Nice People to work.with. Timley response to inquiries.  Easy format and controls. Would like to have more master control over deleting administrative users and etc
Super helpful.   Great  fast support . Of course, I think the fees are a bit high for some of the rings we do.   Mainly when kids pay large amounts, how much the fees are.

Review.Titre: Very good way to manage your league's…
Review.Contenu: Very good way to manage your league's registrations.  The Admin tools are fairly comprehensive and what I cannot do their staff is able to do promptly.
Great site and support, easy to navigate. May need some fine tuning on the admin side, but so far a life saver especially on the communication side.

Review.Titre: Generally very good system for our…
Review.Contenu: Generally very good system for our sports league.  Wish we could generate rosters by team directly instead of a dump to Excel.

I have been on several youth sports boards over the years and have changed websites on a few different occasions. The set up and customer service of Jersey Watch is FANTASTIC. They are as hands on as you want them to be and follow up to ensure a sooth transition. Other sites seem to really be reducing this area as the years go by and make transitioning difficult as most of us don't have a background it this type of stuffWeb site is nice, easy to navigate, setup and manage. The only reason I gave this 4 stars and not 5 is because the registration module, as it are currently configured, relies on parents to select the correct program/ division. While this SHOULD work for most grade/ sex based divisions eg. 5 / 6th grade Boys Lacrosse vs 7/8th grade Girls Lacrosse it will not be robust enough to administer registrations for for age based Sports. Meaning there is no way to restrict a male with a July birthday from registering for a sport/ division for Girls that has a June birthday cutoff. If/when that is addressed this would be a 5 star all sport site.

Review.Titre: The request was to add my new logo to my…
Review.Contenu: The request was to add my new logo to my web site and Sierra completed quickly and all went well.  thanks

Review.Titre: Our experience with Jersey Watch as…
Review.Contenu: Our experience with Jersey Watch as been great so far and I would definitely recommend them.

Review.Titre: I am very pleased so far
Review.Contenu: I am very pleased so far. Tim has ben great and people like the new site
They are great and can assist with any and all requests when needed.
Great Follow-Up, Follow-Through, and overall Customer Service!

Review.Titre: Very Helpful and support is always a…
Review.Contenu: Very Helpful and support is always a call or email away.
So far so good, easy to use and great, quick response from the customer service team. Makes my use the website very useful and easy to streamline all important information.

I’ve had such a great experience with Jersey Watch already. Immediately after signing up to use their services, I’ve been contacted consistently to ensure that everything is going well. They have been so helpful and answered all questions that I’ve had. They communicated promptly about website designs. There were a few changes that needed to be made, and they did not hesitate to assist and make changes. I am so happy I chose Jersey Watch to help manage my cheer team.
Great customer service.  Answered all of our questions in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: I was having trouble on the site that…
Review.Contenu: I was having trouble on the site that was recently migrated so I needed to ask for help. Sierra and Tim were extremely helpful, prompt with their responses and did an amazing job assisting to resolve and went over and above with a “Time Machine” search to find some of the content that I wasn’t able to populate. I can’t say enough about how great they and Jersey Watch has been to work with.
Super great experience. Fast, easy and exactly what we were looking for.

The absolute best experience! I was not expecting it to be so easy and turn out so great. The customer service was excellent. I knew what was going on and when to expect to hear from them. The set up was insanely easy. I would highly recommend Jersey Watch!

Review.Titre: The customer service rep answered my…
Review.Contenu: The customer service rep answered my question quicky and she was very thorough.

Review.Titre: Great customer service and easy to work…
Review.Contenu: Great customer service and easy to work with.

Review.Titre: Had connection problems with some of…
Review.Contenu: Had connection problems with some of the links imbedded on our webpages when Jersey Watch upgraded the package but the issue got remedied within the day. Great response time! Thanks.

Review.Titre: The BEST, most Affordable way to go...
Review.Contenu: Customer service has been extremely responsive, helpful, and courteous! Jersey watch gave such a professional look tailored to our organization. Their website options are all user friendly and organizes all the information our community needs from us. I would recommend them to anyone!

Review.Titre: I am ok with doing a lot of online…
Review.Contenu: I am ok with doing a lot of online stuff, but when I am questioning things, I can just send a message and the support team has been AWESOME at making it happen or fixing things. The dashboard is really easy to navigate and so far, everything is running great! Thank team!!
The knowledge and responsiveness from Sierra was excellent.  She actually reached out to us and initiated getting our account up to date and walk us through what we needed to compete.

The move from our previous platform to Jesey Watch was extremly easy. We were given excellent guidence and support from the Jersey Watch Team.The ease of operation and quick response to any questions or concerns was appreciated.I can't thank them enough for making a potential nightmare into a smooth transition.

Review.Titre: Jersey Watch is always quick with…
Review.Contenu: Jersey Watch is always quick with support.  We have never had a question go unanswered or not resolved quickly.  They are a pleasure to work with and look forward to a great partnership in the future.

I do not have any website design or software developer experience. However, The Jersey Watch program has been really easy to use and customize. The already made dashboard is a major plus to help illustrate key information to team members. Lastly, the announcement feature is Amazing! One thing I have to add, I don't like not having the ability to pick up the phone and call someone about the website. However, the Jersey Watch team do a really good job at responding to emails very quickly. Great Job Jersey Watch Team!

The Jersey Watch system is very well designed and easy to learn and use from an Admin standpoint. The system has the features we need to manage our softball league with 190 members. Support from the JW help center has been outstanding. They quickly respond to your questions and offer suggestions when appropriate.
Customer service is fantastic.  Very helpful and willing to take control and make things right without me having to do all the work!

Review.Titre: Super fast response to my questions
Review.Contenu: Super fast response to my questions. Clear explanation of how to solve my problem. Very reliable and consistently high level of service.

Sierra at Jersey Watch responded very quickly to my question and provided extra information regarding adding discounts to our registration event that was very helpful. Very helpful and fast. We're really glad we switched to JerseyWatch from GotSport. Thanks again!
My experience with Jersey Watch has been nothing short of amazing. Their extremely timely with their responses and you can tell their client driven. Keep up the great work team!

The customer service team at Jersey Watch has been outstanding.  No matter the question or my lack of expertise, the Jersey Watch team gets back to me promptly and exceeds my expectation.  I couldn't be happier with our experience thus far.
The customer service is exceptional! Not being tech savvy at all, I had lots of questions. They got right back to me and helped me with them all! I highly recommend Jersey Watch!

Review.Titre: From day one the help/support team has…
Review.Contenu: From day one the help/support team has been a tremendous assist! We absolutely appreciate them doing beyond and above anytime we need them. This is by far the MOST user friendly website we’ve used and plan to stay with Jersey Watch as long as we’re in business.

Sierra is very clear with her answers. Plus professional and nice!The reason I left our previous provider was the slow response time. I barely hit Send and Sierra and her co-workers are responding. Much appreciated.

I thought this would simply be an off-the-shelf solution, but the communication team was not only right there with me, but they were active in developing the website.  When I needed help fixing a program I had created, they responded in minutes and helped me fix it before it caused an issue.

Jersey watch was Amazing! They were quick with following up with my initial question and completed my request extremely fast! Even the customer care specialist, Courtney, was kind and responsive.  A situation that I thought was going to take a long time to get resolved, was completed in less than one business day!

Review.Titre: We have had nothing but great experiences
Review.Contenu: We have had nothing but great experiences with Jersey Watch.  The website has helped streamline our team information into one local spot and has allowed us to request and receive payments cashless.  Our families love the text messages for quick updates and how visually organized the website looks .  On the admin side, it has been a true blessing having quick and knowledgeable help from Jersey Watch on demand.  It is really easy to send a message asking for help with something on the website and receiving a response within 24 hours.  We upgraded our subscription to renew annually because we are very happy with the site so far.
I was looking for a website and found Jersey Watch! So far my experiences with them have been excellent! They are very informative, helpful and respond very quick!

Im sure there are other sites out there, that provide similar services, but the customer service is beyond amazing. Every time i have a question or an issue, they are there for me with prompt, very helpful and polite service. My website is great too.6 stars!
They have been so very helpful in getting our Summer Recreation website up and running. I couldn't be happier with how it turned out. I highly recommend Jersey Watch!

Review.Titre: Just what we needed at just the right time
Review.Contenu: We were really in a crunch to get a new site, selected and set up. Spring registration was approaching fast and the moved to Jersey Watch could not have gone more smoothly. Everyone I talked to you has been extremely nice and helpful to talk through ideas and help us get the site up and running quickly. We already have registrations coming in.

Review.Titre: The response time from the support team…
Review.Contenu: The response time from the support team was incredible.  They are eager to get my website customizations right the first time.  All the while requesting feedback on their performance.  Couldn't be happier.

Review.Titre: The customer service team is excellent
Review.Contenu: The customer service team is excellent. They are responsive and I get quick results. The platform is simple to operate and set up. I am a start-up summer lacrosse team, and Jersey Watch helped me get organized quickly. Great product!
Easy communication and changes made quickly! Wish I had more creative control without having to email but aside from that everything else is seem less!!

Review.Titre: Jersey Watch is hands down the best…
Review.Contenu: Jersey Watch is hands down the best customer service I’ve ever experienced. They quickly answered every question I’ve presented and provided detailed instructions to make sure I was able to complete the best site possible. I will recommend to everyone!

Review.Titre: I have nothing but positive things to…
Review.Contenu: I have nothing but positive things to say. Every part of the process has been easy and I appreciate how much they communicate. They haven’t forgotten about me and are always there to help.
Jersey Watch has been a great experience.  Everyone who visits our site from Jersey Watch says it looks great.  Adding information and listing what exactly you want is easy.

Review.Titre: We've been very happy using JerseyWatch…
Review.Contenu: We've been very happy using JerseyWatch for our youth soccer platform. Any questions we've had have been answered quickly by friendly and helpful staff!

We are just in the beginning stages of implementing this system, and their customer service has already been phenomenal. They answer emails quickly, and their responses are always very helpful. I would highly recommend them to anyone I know who needs this type of system for their sports programs!
Very quick turnaround time creating our contact list.

Review.Titre: Would recommend to anyone looking for…
Review.Contenu: Would recommend to anyone looking for help in the sport world!!! Amazing customer service, well worth the money!! Thank you to this amazing company for helping us with our registrations and website! We love it!
I sent an email to asking for help, and they got back to me within minutes with a solution to my question.  This is how it works every time.  Very satisfied customer!
The staff at Jersey Watch has been extremely helpful and available to answer any questions. Very prompt service replying to all our questions. Website is user friendly and easy to edit.

Easy interface. The staff go above and beyond customizing the website to suit specific needs. In my case, over 100 golf students. Customer support is firing on all cylinders. Very fast and efficient responses.
Jersey Watch responded quickly to my email and provided me with multiple solutions to my issue. They were also able to help me resolve it and get my website up and running again.
JW offers great admin support for our league by quickly answering questions in a clear and concise manner.

Review.Titre: Jersey Watch customer service is always…
Review.Contenu: Jersey Watch customer service is always very quick to respond to my questions and help to provide easy solutions.  10/10 in my book!
The fact that I had an issue that had nothing to do with Jersey Watch and they were still able to help me speaks volumes about the precedence they put around their customers - such as myself.
Sierra and Courtney were very responsive to every question I had and were easy to work with to help me resolve my questions.  Jersey Watch has been a fantastic company to work with.

Review.Titre: Jersey Watch is the "Go To" for league management
Review.Contenu: Jersey Watch team has been extremely helpful in setting up website and registration. They have a quick response time and have good information sources to follow up on their website.
Been using the platform for 3 months and every time I have a question, they respond within an hour.  Great customer service and helpful to solve our needs/requests.

Review.Titre: Whenever there’s an issue with our site…
Review.Contenu: Whenever there’s an issue with our site we email them they email right back!! Customer services is the absolute best. They don’t mind helping you at all.

Review.Titre: I requested my needs for an online…
Review.Contenu: I requested my needs for an online registration, and someone was back to him within an hour squaring away all my needs!

Review.Titre: The response to a technical question I…
Review.Contenu: The response to a technical question I had was answered in 5 minutes. They attached a video explaining how to embed the video on my website. Very fast Customer Service!

The customer service was amazing. Sierra was available to answer all of our questions and was super responsive! We had an amazing transition experience. The website design is wonderful and easy to use from a functional standpoint.
They are attentive, helpful, and actually care. I recommend this site to anyone that is looking to have a great website with your team sport!
It has refined, out-of-the-box functionality. It is user-friendly and is more capable than you think.

Review.Titre: The greatest sports team management tool!
Review.Contenu: JerseyWatch is the greatest sports team management platform I have ever accidentally stumbled across! I recently starting a youth coaching business, and began by setting up a wordpress theme on my site, as I usually do. When it came time to start customizing, adding registration processes, payment processing, waivers, etc., etc., it suddenly felt like a mountain of work to plow through.I somehow stumbled across JerseyWatch, decided to give it a try, and have not looked back since! JerseyWatch has a great site design with plenty of customization options; there are a few items I'd put on a "features wish-list" but I've been assured by JerseyWatch that many of the items I've requested are already in-progress and due to go live shortly. Excellent!JerseyWatch INCLUDES registration processes and management, payment processing and deposits to your bank, reporting on key metrics, digital waiver(s) hosting and signing, AND includes messaging via BOTH text and email to your participants. Messaging and payment processing are usually expensive, stand-alone processes to be added, but JerseyWatch includes those!If the above isn't enough, their Customer Service is AMAZING. I have asked multiple questions and ALWAYS received incredibly timely responses. Just this morning I emailed in a question, and received a video walk-through reply, which was recorded just to answer my question! I'm blown away by the support. I usually scoff when a company touts "customer service" as one of their key benefits, but I'll tell you, JerseyWatch means it and lives up to it.1,000,000% recommended.
Update! They really worked hard to address my concern! Im much happier and very elated that they took my original review seriously!
Jersey watch has been awesome for our organization, they have helped us every step of the way, we can’t be more happier.
I have been with Jersey Watch for several years and couldn't be happier with their quick and courteous customer service. I highly recommend!
Uploading contacts in a matter minutes vs. days, has really shown their growth & enhancements over the years!
Siedrra Swigert was awesome! Helped solve my issue quickly! Appreciate her help & support tremendously!
Excellent customer service! Created a video to walk me through the steps. Fast and prompt replies.

Review.Titre: Sierra went above and beyond to convert…
Review.Contenu: Sierra went above and beyond to convert contact list from a pdf file. She had to do it manually.
Questions were answered clearly,  transferred over our website to this platform and tweaked a few things for us,  smooth and easy

Review.Titre: They provided a solution for my…
Review.Contenu: They provided a solution for my question. The site has been straightforward and easy to operate.

The response was quick, as usual.  They are able to make a contact list for me and save me tons of time.
They answered my questions, great problem solving skills, really quick on response time and understanding the situation.

Review.Titre: Quick response to my question and quick…
Review.Contenu: Quick response to my question and quick verification and help in removal or how to remove. Great product, customer support and has worked well for our organization.
Timely responses with inquires and issues.. Great customer service. Also, did an excellent job designing our webpage.
So far so good!The staff is very helpful and knowledgeable. Every question I send their way is always answered promptly. The feedback that we have gotten from parents so far has been great.
Super fast response to my issue. Website modification was done in minutes and was exactly what I needed.
The operators of the website are unbelievable. They respond quickly, and are very helpful. Our website has been launched and operated smoothly.

Review.Contenu: The team has been very responsive and easy to work with. They even took the time to customize the website to our logo. Great experience!

Sierra was quick to respond and helpful while trying to get my website back up and running smoothly.
Great customer service. Easy to build website.

I’ve been using Jersey watch website for years now. The customer service is amazing.
Super prompt!  Did a great job!  Couldn't be happier!
Sierra Swigert Is always fast to help and is amazing! She has helped so much with our website :)
Super fast response, very helpful.  The best registration service our park has used.
Very quick response and directly addressed my questions.
I requested a change to my website, and they had it complete in under 24 hours and followed up to ensure I was satisfied with the change.
Very attentive and responsive to all your needs and questions. Prompt and got back to you right away.

Review.Titre: Response time was great as always
Review.Contenu: Response time was great as always! Request was prepared as requested without issues!
